name: Don't Mess With A Goose With A Gun!
name_original: Don't Mess With A Goose With A Gun!
description:
Submission for the  One Game a Month #12 jam.

By @Just A Random Squid (Programmer), @Noub_Spi (Artist) and Epic Challenger (conceptualist)

A game about being a goose with a gun shooting down a chicken army!

Also you're a goose, but I think I already mentioned it...
